alert.note: Alert for Austin; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Waller; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:02AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wharton, southeastern Austin, west central Galveston, Fort Bend, northeastern Brazoria, southeastern Waller and southern Harris Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 302 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cinco Ranch, or near Pecan Grove, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, southwestern League City, Sugar Land, Missouri City, Friendswood, Deer Park, Rosenberg, Alvin, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, West University Place, Katy, Richmond, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Webster, Manvel and Hunters Creek Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Waller; Wharton
